DefaultReaderConfiguration.fullDescription: Web application firewall, logs events based on actions taken on web traffic in order to prevent attacks.

file.toolTipText: Directory or path to read from

string.toolTipText: Hostname of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

integer.toolTipText: Port number of the nDepth appliance to receive log data

select.toolTipText: Data routing (normalized alerts to Manager and/or raw data to nDepth)

integer.toolTipText: Number of seconds between log reads

FastPattern.description: ServiceInfo: Robot Activity, Credit card numbers, Parameter seen, Cross site scripting
FastPattern.pattern: \S+\s*\d+\s*[-\w:]+ [-\w.]+ TRUSTWAVE_WAF<PIPE>Name:[\w ]*(?:robot activity|Credit card numbers displayed|Parameter seen|Cross site scripting)

FastPattern.description: ServiceWarning: Leakage, Encoding abuse, Unexpected characters, Parameter manipulation
FastPattern.pattern: \S+\s*\d+\s*[-\w:]+ [-\w.]+ TRUSTWAVE_WAF<PIPE>Name:(?:(?:File or directory name|SQL\s*information) leakage|Encoding abuse|Unexpected characters|Parameter manipulation)

FastPattern.description: EncryptedTraffic: Server configured to support unsafe SSL cipher
FastPattern.pattern: \S+\s*\d+\s*[-\w:]+ [-\w.]+ TRUSTWAVE_WAF<PIPE>Name:Server configured to support unsafe SSL cipher
\S+\s*\d+\s*[-\w:]+ [-\w.]+ TRUSTWAVE_WAF<PIPE>Name:SQL injection in Free Form field
\S+\s*\d+\s*[-\w:]+ [-\w.]+ TRUSTWAVE_WAF<PIPE>Name:(?:\S+ file does not exist|Local file inclusion)
